name: Los Pistoleros
description:
Los Pistoleros

Local Multiplayer Spaghetti Western Arena Shooter for Windows and Flash, still in development.

By James Farmer, made in HaxeFlixel

Requires at least two controllers to play!

Controls:

  • Left Stick: Move
  • Right Stick: Aim Pistol
  • RB: Shoot
  • RT: Shoot (Windows only)
  • A or LT: Jump
  • X: Open/Close Cylinder
  • Y: Load Bullet

Music by Ennio Morricone (currently placeholder)
